DIRECTOR OF FINANCE
Professional Summary
Senior financial hospitality executive with over twenty years of managerial expertise, a proven and passionate leader in achieving goals.
Big picture focus on the essentials to a profitable operation: Customer Service Excellence, Cultivating Employee Loyalty, and Financial Accountability with the owners' interest as priority.

SKILLS

Financial reporting US GAAP principles Fiscal budgeting Cash flow analysis
Individual tax returns Federal/State tax preparation PeopleSoft and Essbase Customer relations

Work in properties with annual revenues up to $39M.
Full responsibility of balance sheet and general ledger.
Member of the Executive Team providing financial direction.
Yield management strategy and group business analysis.
Lead financial and operations reviews with managers.
Educate newer managers on how to read and interpret financial statements as it relates to their responsibilities.
Establish and maintain all internal controls, obtaining best audit review.
Recruit, train, and mentor personnel.
Currently supervising a staff of 20 associates.
Negotiate contract with third party and hotel partners.
Responsible for hotel's local area network and all I.T. related duties.
Due-diligence reporting for financing and acquisition.
Preparing any special reports, statements, and other items as requested.
Special Projects Increased cash flow with aggressive receivable collections.
Reduce departmental and overhead expenses by proper allocation of duties and negotiations with vendor to reduce cost.

<JD_START>
Job Title: Sr Financial Advisor - Healthcare

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Accounting/Auditing, Finance

Description:
The Sr Financial Advisor leads and coordinates work efforts to provide divisional leadership teams with analytical insight, financial discipline and business outputs to actualize our financial strategy. Works collaboratively to build cross-functional relationships and drive financial results. Functions as financial strategy leader with assigned business partners to create meaningful and actionable outputs to align to the company’s overall strategic and financial goals and objectives.
Works directly with staff and leadership across one or multiple divisions to proactively identify and prioritize financial strategies and create meaningful and actionable outputs that drive the development of financial plans aligned to the company’s overall strategic goalsLeverages customer and consumer insights to develop holistic financial strategies and plans to effectively drive business outcomes and maximize ROISupports the development of divisional strategic positions on behalf of leadership and represents those positions within the divisionBuilds and manages relationships with internal partners to drive financial analyses focused on business strategies and opportunities with substantial levels of importance and visibilityLeads annual and long-term financial planning efforts and analysesCollaborates and executes financial and qualitative analyses and thought leadership at a departmental and multi-function divisional levelDrives financial innovation and stewardship through collaboration and consultation with internal stakeholders to identify, plan and execute initiatives with significant financial impact. Partners with internal clients to better understand what problems they are trying to solve, help them articulate their vision and define financial impacts and success. Provides methods and resources to support their execution of those plans and quantification and realization of benefitsSupports the development of new ideas that solve to understand, estimate and minimize the financial impact of existing or emerging issues the business faces. Evaluates those ideas to determine viability and opportunity for success and follows through to implementation as necessary
Hiring RequirementsBachelor's degree or advanced degree (where required)5+ years of experience in related fieldIn lieu of degree, 7+ years of experience in related field
Preferred Skills/QualificationsExperience in Healthcare industry,Excellent written and oral communication skills and a demonstrated ability to interact with Clients.Mature presence, empathy, intellectual curiosity, and ability to learn quickly.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
<JD_END>
